name: Ice Mage Adventures
description:
Ice Mage Adventures is a game about a young wizard's apprentice completing his training. This young apprentice must survive 15 tests, as well as defeat his master in magical combat before he is considered a true master of the arcane. Are you up to the task?

What's in the Game:
  • 15 regular levels
  • 1 boss fight
  • 4 difficult EX levels after beating the game
  • Adequate Beautiful programmer art throughout
